      • queryToStructure

        public static java.lang.String queryToStructure(java.lang.String query)
        Converts a query to its structure by replacing: '''what ever stands here''' to '''string''' "what ever stands here" to "string" 'what ever stands here' to 'string' what:ever to prefix:suffix to \ <> to blank true or false to Bool any number to Number any variable to ?var any tag to \@tag any type of a literal to ^^"type"
        Parameters:
        query - the query
        Returns:
        the structure of the query

      • queryVarRename

        public static java.lang.String queryVarRename(java.lang.String query)
        Renames the variables of a query to ?var or in the case of mutliple variables to ?var1,...,?varn where n is the no of distinct variables in the query
        Parameters:
        query - the query
        Returns:
        the query with the renamed variables

                       java.lang.String output,
                       java.lang.Integer threshold)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        For all queries in the input file the query and its frequency will be written in the output file if the frequency is greater or equal than the threshold
        Parameters:
        input - the input file name
        output - the output file name
        threshold - the threshold
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • similarity

        public static void similarity(java.lang.String input,
              java.lang.String output,
              int delta)
                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Calculates for every query with every query in the input file their similarity and if the similarity is over a calculated threshold it will be written in the output file
        Parameters:
        input - the name of the input file with the queries
        output - the name of the output file in which the (calculated) query ids and their similarity will be written
        delta - a given parameter for the threshold calculation see also DBpedia SPARQL Benchmark
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - the file not found exception

      • similarity

        public static void similarity(java.io.File input,
              java.io.File output,
              int delta)
                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Calculates for every query with every query in the input file their similarity and if the similarity is over a calculated threshold it will be written in the output file
        Parameters:
        input - the input file with the queries
        output - the output file in which the (calculated) query ids and their similarity will be written
        delta - a given parameter for the threshold calculation see also DBpedia SPARQL Benchmark
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - the file not found exception

      • getSimilarity

        public static java.lang.Double getSimilarity(java.lang.String query1,
                             java.lang.String query2,
                             int[] threshold)
        Gets the similarity of two queries. First step calculating the feature vector distance and test if it's over the given threshold Second step if this is the case, calculate the levenshtein distance with the given threshold Third step if levenshtein is not 0.0 it will return the max of the two similarities
        Parameters:
        query1 - the query1
        query2 - the query2
        threshold - the thresholds [featureVectorDistance, levenshtein steps]
        Returns:
        the similarity if the similarity is in the given thresholds, null otherwise

      • structsToFreqQueries

        public static void structsToFreqQueries(java.lang.String structs,
                        java.lang.String freq,
                        java.lang.String output)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Matches the structures in a given file with the most frequent query and write it in the output file
        Parameters:
        structs - the name of the file with the structures to match with
        freq - the name of the file with the sorted frequent queries
        output - the name of the output file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
